sentences.en: A fresh egg will sink and an old egg will float.
sentences.cn: 新鲜鸡蛋会沉下去而不新鲜的会浮在上面。

sentences.en: At the sink, Neil noisily gargled something medicinal.
sentences.cn: 尼尔在洗脸池边用某种药液咕噜咕噜地漱口。

sentences.en: Dirty plates were piled high in the sink.
sentences.cn: 脏盘子在洗涤槽里堆得很高。

sentences.en: He decided to scour the sink.
He dropped his plate into the sink.
I was about to sink into the quicksand of sin.
sentences.cn: 我就要陷入罪孽的深渊了。

sentences.en: In a naval battle your aim is to sink the enemy's ship.
sentences.cn: 在海战中目标就是击沉敌船。

sentences.en: Joanne stood with her hands on the sink, staring out the window.
sentences.cn: 乔安妮站着，两手放在水槽上，眼睛定定地望着窗外。

sentences.en: Make sure the draining board, sink and plug hole are regularly disinfected.
sentences.cn: 滴水板、水槽和塞孔一定要定期消毒。

sentences.en: She was bent over the sink washing the dishes.
She went to the sink and ran water into her empty glass.
sentences.cn: 她走到水槽边，把空玻璃杯灌上水。
她有时会陷入忧郁之中。

sentences.en: The heavy guns sank up to their barrels in the mud.
sentences.cn: 这些沉重的大炮深陷在泥里，只露出炮管。

sentences.en: The kids watched as the coin sank to the bottom of the pool.
sentences.cn: 孩子们看着那枚硬币沉到池底。

sentences.en: The knife for cutting sausage was sitting in the sink.
sentences.cn: 切香肠用的刀放在水槽里。

sentences.en: Their motorboat struck a rock and began to sink.
sentences.cn: 他们的摩托艇触了礁，开始下沉。

sentences.en: There were dirty dishes in the sink.
We squatted beside the pool and watched the diver sink slowly down.
sentences.cn: 我们蹲在水池旁，看着潜水者慢慢沉下水。

words.tran_cn: 沉没的；凹陷的；比周围低的
铅锤；铅坠；[矿业] 凿井工；下沉的人

phrases.tran_cn: （因意识到已发生或将要发生不愉快、讨厌的事情而引起的）颓丧感
激进现实主义；厨房洗涤池；厨房洗涤盆
完全靠个人努力决定成功与否

trans.tran_en: a large open container that you fill with water and use for washing yourself, washing dishes etc

trans.tran_cn: 下沉，坐下，减弱，挖掘，使受挫，击球入洞，灌
trans.tran_en: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

trans.tran_cn: 下沉，沉没；降低，下落；陷入；衰退，恶化
trans.tran_en: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

trans.tran_cn: 使下沉，使沉没；降低；掘，挖，凿
trans.tran_en: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc
